description: Principled accuracy evaluation using GSM8K benchmark question
reference: Cobbe, K., et al. (2021). Training Verifiers to Solve Math Word Problems. arXiv:2110.14168

questions.question: Janet's dogs eat 2 pounds of dog food each day. Janet has 5 dogs. How many pounds of dog food does Janet need to feed her dogs for 30 days?
questions.explanation: 2 pounds per dog per day × 5 dogs × 30 days = 300 pounds
